column1: Smoque BBQ////You WILL get a seat - I promise. I know the line is out the door
column2: I know every table is full - but trust me - they will get you a seat. While you are waiting in line to order
column3: these guys (I call them air traffic controllers) will come to you and ask how many people you have. While you are ordering
column4: they will find you a table. This is one of the most important things to remember
column5: because the line out the door will really put off first timers - but you will get a table.
